verses.name: 2 Kings 6:25
verses.text: And there was a great famine in Samaria: and, behold, they besieged it, until an ass’s head was sold for fourscore pieces of silver, and the fourth part of a cab of dove’s dung for five pieces of silver.

verses.name: 2 Kings 6:26
verses.text: And as the king of Israel was passing by upon the wall, there cried a woman unto him, saying, Help, my lord, O king.

verses.name: 2 Kings 6:27
verses.text: And he said, If the Lord do not help thee, whence shall I help thee? out of the barnfloor, or out of the winepress?
